name: Fight Right!
description:
Hello! This is my entry to the Mashup GameJam #2 and my first game jam with Godot!

Goal:

Shoot as many zombies as you can while being limited to shoot only to the right

Theme:

The Theme was "Unconventional Means" which can be interpreted as "Achieve something in a different way", here you have to kill as many zombies while being limited to one direction

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Dash

LMB (Hold Down) - shoot

R - Restart

(Zombies might get stuck in the crates sometimes)
